title: Yttrium-induced tunable bandgap for optical data storage applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29812-29826
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05458J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Surbhi Agarwal, D. K. Dwivedi, Pooja Lohia, Manoj Kumar Gupta
Linear and nonlinear optical and electronic properties of Te(1−x)(GeSe0.5)Yx thin films have been studied. Transmission spectra ranging from 500 to 2500 nm were obtained using a UV-visible spectrophotometer to calculate optical properties.
